a) 123
123 = 1111011 = 1.111011 * 2^6
S = 0
E = 6 + 127 = 133 = 10000101
M = 111011000000...00000

b) -123

Same as above, with S = 1

c) 0.1
0.1 = 0.000110011001100... = 1.100110011001100... * 2^(-4)
S = 0
E = -4 + 127 = 01111011
M = 10011001100110011001101

d) 0.2
0.2 = 2 * 0.1 = 1.1001100110011001... * 2 ^ (-3)
S = 0
E = -3 + 127 = 01111100
M = 10011001100110011001101

e) 0.25 
0.25 = 1/4 = 0.01 = 1 * 2^(-2)
S = 0
E = -2 + 127 = 01111101
M = 0

f) -543.21
543 = 1000011111
0.21 = 0.0011010111000010100011...
543.21 = 1000011111.0011010111000010100011... = 1.00001111100110101110001 * 2^9
S = 1
E = 9 + 127 = 10001000
M = 00001111100110101110001
